recipesJson.name: Cash Register Mint
recipesJson.author: goosegirl
recipesJson.description:
When I was growing up, before health restrictions put an end to the practice, restaurants frequently had a bowl of after dinner mints by the cash register. I still enjoy a mint after a spicy meal, so this is my after dinner vape. A soft mint that lingers after the vape.

Purilum's Butter Mint isn't bad, but it needed a little help. 
Vanilla Cream Extra by Wonder Flavors adds the softness I was looking for, and the vanilla compliments the Butter Mint well.

This can be a SNV, but the Vanilla Cream Extra gets better with time.

Tested in OFRF Gear 0.28 ohm, 40 watts

reviews.text: PUR  butter mint is  so under rated   and mixed with the vanilla extra cream  was really SMART   - well done goose girl
